alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 2:19AM MST until November 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the Upper Weiser River with 3 to 6 inches in the West Central and Boise mountains. Accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the mountains above 5000 feet. * WHERE...West Central Mountains, Boise Mountains and Upper Weiser River zones. * WHEN...Through 5 PM MST this afternoon. Most of the snow will fall this morning, then taper off from west to east this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
